details.title: Query details
details.liveQueryDisabled: Live queries are disabled in organization settings
details.automationsTooltip: Query automations let you send data to your log destination on a schedule. When automations are on, data is sent according to a query's interval.
details.reportClippedMessage: A sample of this query's results is included below.
details.reportClippedAutomation: You can still use query automations to complete this report in your log destination.

edit.title: Edit query
edit.confirmDiscard: Are you sure you want to discard your changes?

automations.title: Query automations
automations.pausedMessage: will resume for this query when an interval is set.

delete.title: Delete query
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

saveNew.title: Save new query
saveNew.descriptionHelpText: What information does your query reveal? (optional)
saveNew.intervalHelpText: This is how often your query collects data.
saveNew.observersCanRunHelpText: Users with the Observer role will be able to run this query as a live query.
saveNew.automationsPausedTooltip: Automations and reporting will be paused for this query until an interval is set.
saveNew.automationsHelpText: Historical results will {{not}}be sent to your log destination:
saveNew.targetHelpText: Query will target hosts that have any of these labels:

saveAsNew.title: Save as new query
saveAsNew.message: Save a copy of this query with a new name.

confirmSave.title: Save changes
confirmSave.message: Do you want to save your changes to this query?

confirmSaveChanges.title: Save changes?
confirmSaveChanges.sqlWarning: Changing this query's SQL will delete its previous results, since the existing report does not reflect the updated query.
confirmSaveChanges.warning: The changes you are making to this query will delete its previous results.

saveAsNewQuery.title: Save as new
saveAsNewQuery.duplicateError: A query called "{{name}}" already exists for {{team}}.
saveAsNewQuery.error: Could not create query. Please try again.

previewData.title: Preview data
previewData.description: The data sent to your configured log destination will look similar to the following JSON:
previewData.snapshotTooltip: The "snapshot" key includes the query's results. These will be unique to your query.

manageAutomations.description: Query automations let you send data gathered from macOS, Windows, and Linux hosts to a log destination. Data is sent according to a query's interval.
manageAutomations.selectLabel: Choose which queries will send data:
manageAutomations.addQueryPrompt: Add a query to turn on automations.
manageAutomations.configureHelpText: Users with the admin role can

empty.title: No queries found
empty.description: No queries match the current filters
empty.addFirst: Create your first query to get started

noResults.collectingMessage: Fleet is collecting query results. Check back in about {{time}}.
noResults.preventsSaving: The following setting prevents saving this query's results in Fleet:
noResults.globallyDisabled: Query reports are globally disabled in organization settings.
noResults.discardDataEnabled: This query has Discard data enabled.
noResults.loggingNotSnapshot: The logging setting for this query is not Snapshot.
noResults.noSchedule: This query does not collect data on a schedule. Add an interval or run this as a live query to see results.
noResults.noDataYet: This query has returned no data so far. If you're expecting to see results, try running a live query to get diagnostics.

report.title: Query report
report.clippedTooltip: Fleet has retained a sample of early results for reference. Reporting is paused until existing data is deleted. You can reset this report by updating the query's SQL, or by temporarily enabling the discard data setting and disabling it again.
report.emptyInfo: This query has returned no data so far.

editPage.duplicateName: A query with that name already exists for {{team}}.
editPage.createError: Something went wrong creating your query. Please try again.
editPage.duplicateError: A query with this name already exists.
editPage.updateError: Something went wrong updating your query. Please try again.
editPage.liveQueryUnavailable: Fleet is unable to run a live query. Refresh the page or log in again. If this keeps happening please

queryResults.noResults: Your live query returned no results. Expecting to see results? Check to see if the host{{plural}} you targeted reported "Online" or check out the "Errors" table.
queryResults.resultsClippedMessage: A sample of this query's results and errors is included below. Please target fewer hosts at once to build a full set of results.

discardData.label: Discard data
discardData.helpText: The most recent results for each host will not be available in Fleet.
discardData.globallyDisabledText: This setting is ignored because query reports in Fleet have been
discardData.globallyDisabledTooltip: A Fleet administrator can enable query reports under Organization settings > Advanced options > Disable query reports.
discardData.differentialBanner: The Discard data setting is ignored when differential logging is enabled. This query's results will not be saved in Fleet.

liveQuery.runError: Something went wrong running your query. Please try again.
liveQuery.noHostsTargeted: Your target selections did not include any hosts. Please try again.
liveQuery.alreadyCreated: A campaign with the provided query text has already been created
liveQuery.forbidden: It seems you do not have the rights to run this query. If you believe this is in error, please contact your administrator.
liveQuery.genericError: Something has gone wrong. Please try again.

manage.title: Manage packs
manage.description: Manage query packs to schedule recurring queries for your hosts.
manage.deleteError: Unable to delete {{packOrPacks}}. Please try again.
manage.enableDisableError: Unable to {{enableOrDisable}} selected {{packOrPacks}}. Please try again.

empty.description: Query packs allow you to schedule recurring queries for your hosts.
empty.noMatch: No packs match the current search criteria
empty.tryAgain: Expecting to see packs? Try again in a few seconds as the system catches up.

edit.updateError: Could not update pack. Please try again.
edit.duplicateNameError: Unable to update pack. Pack names must be unique.

create.success: Pack successfully created. Add queries to your pack.
create.duplicateNameError: Unable to create pack. Pack names must be unique.

errors.frequencyPositive: Frequency must be an integer greater than zero
errors.frequencyMax: Frequency must be an integer that does not exceed 604,800 (i.e. 7 days)

removeQuery.title: Remove queries
